General.Name: Zhejiang Wansheng Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Wansheng Co., Ltd. produces and sells organic phosphorus-based flame retardants, special amines, and cardanol based curing agents and diluents in China. It offers coating BU products, which include solvent-free, solvent-based, and light color Phenalkamine curing agents, as well as Phenalkamide curing agents, active and non-active epoxy diluents, and cardanols; amine BU products comprising special amines, Pyrrolidones, fatty tertiary amines, and aliphatic amines and amides; and catalyst BU products, including rigid PU, PC/ABS, flex PU, HIPS/MMPO, PVC/soft, epoxy resin, intermediate, and other products. The company also provides flame retardant BU products; and personal and home care products. Zhejiang Wansheng Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Linhai, China.
